body: If code reuse is considered important (and I'm not sure it is; at least there are some proponents against the idea in many cases), the we could move the to-be-shared code into a new public package like `golang.org/x/crypto/innards/tlscommon' and then `golang.org/x/crypto/dtls` can use it, and `crypto/tls` can vendor it privately into the standard library to use.
